FuncDef: The display bgp all summary command displays information about BGP peers in the address family, including the peer status and route statistics. The display bgp all summary command displays information about BGP peers in the address family, including the peer status and route statistics.
ExtraInfo: During fault location, you can run the display bgp all summary command to view information about BGP peers in the address family, including the peer status and route statistics. The supported address family depends on the actual device.
